Minerals help to build strong bones and teeth, while fiber helps to keep the digestive system running smoothly.

Nutrition is the process of providing the body with the nutrients it needs to grow and stay healthy. It is a vital part of living a healthy lifestyle. Food provides the body with the energy and nutrients it needs to function properly. A well-balanced diet includes a variety of foods from different food groups, such as fruits, vegetables, whole grains, lean proteins, and healthy fats. These food groups provide the body with the necessary nutrients, vitamins, and minerals. Adequate nutrition helps to build and repair tissues, support growth and development, and maintain overall health. A healthy diet is essential for maintaining a strong immune system, which helps to fight off illnesses and infections. These nutrients give us energy to play, learn, and grow. A well-balanced diet includes a variety of foods from different groups, such as fruits, vegetables, whole grains, lean proteins, and healthy fats. Eating a variety of foods helps ensure we get all the nutrients our bodies need to stay healthy. For example, fruits and vegetables are rich in vitamins and minerals, while whole grains provide fiber and B vitamins. Lean proteins like chicken and fish give us the building blocks for strong muscles and bones. By making healthy food choices, we can help our bodies stay strong and healthy.
